verbs.description: Several current and former Fox employees , such as " Family Guy " creator Seth MacFarlane and Judd Apatow , [V: have] condemned the company for its association of Fox News and the network 's coverage of President Trump 's " zero - tolerance " immigration policy .

[ARG0: Several current and former Fox employees , such as " Family Guy " creator Seth MacFarlane and Judd Apatow ,] have [V: condemned] [ARG1: the company] [ARG2: for its association of Fox News and the network 's coverage of President Trump 's " zero - tolerance " immigration policy] .
